### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a chest (position (-16.5, -49.5))

### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a chest (position (43.5, -82.5))

### Iron plate factory at position (40.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0)) 
- Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0)) 
- Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0)) 
- Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0)) 
- Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0))

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with no power

### Inserter system at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5)), chest (position (2.5, 0.5)), and small electric pole (position (2.5, 1.5))

### Inserter system at position (0.5, 3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position (0.5, 3.5)) and chest (position (0.5, 2.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment but being out of fuel
- Make sure to have a sufficient amount of fuel in the burner equipment before using it
- Ensure that the fuel is being transported to the equipment

### Errors when using furnace but not having ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the ingredients are being transported to the furnace
- Make sure that the furnace has enough space to produce the output

### Errors when using steam engine but not having input liquid
- Ensure that the liquid is being transported to the steam engine
- Make sure that the steam engine is properly connected to the liquid source

### Errors when using offshore pump but not having a fluid system
- Ensure that the offshore pump is properly connected to a fluid system
- Make sure that the fluid system has enough capacity to handle the output of the offshore pump

### Errors when using lab but having no power
- Ensure that the lab is properly connected to a power source
- Make sure that the power source has enough capacity to power the lab
